value.name: City Council Awards Commendation To Police Officer, Firefighter/EMT

value.name: HPD,HFD personnel recognized for service, Council hears public comments
value.description: Hopkinsville Fire Engineer Jason Hale and Hopkinsville Police Sergeant Shannon Wells were honored for their above and beyond service in the community during Tuesday night’s Hopkinsville City Council meeting.
